high_descs: Turn right until you are facing the long row of white vanity cabinets.
Pick up the white candle with the gold base that is sitting on the countertop.
Walk to your left and turn to face the toilet.
Place the candle on top of the toilet tank near the front edge, between the roll of toilet paper and the empty cardboard roll.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle on the toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn around completely and walk to the tub. Turn left to face the dresser.
Pick up the candle from the dresser.
Turn around completely and go to the left and turn right to face the toilet.
Place the candle on the back end of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle to the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the white dresser on the left.
Pick up the candle holder with the candle on the right back side of the dresser.
Turn around, head right and walk to the white toilet on the right.
Put the candle holder with the candle on the right side of the toilet tank to the left of the full toilet paper roll.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle on a toilet tank.
